doc.title: Journal for Jordan
doc.plot: The project, "Journal for Jordan," is based on Dana Canedy's essay, which describes a 200-page journal penned by her fianc√©, 1st Sgt. Charles Monroe King, for their son. The 48-year-old soldier was killed in Baghdad in October, one month shy of finishing his tour of duty. He had left for the Middle East before his son was born.
